pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the clinical effect of transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) in the treatment of prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
Magnetic Resonance Imaging-Guided Transurethral Ultrasound Ablation of Prostate Cancer: A Systematic Review
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35029127/
